name: Akum Blaise
text: I have the opportunity to work with Enow on a couple of projects and I must say I am marveled by his high level of competence. I would recommend him to anyone looking for a full stack web developer.

name: Njita Arnaud
text: Enow is a great team player, a leader who doesn’t just assigns or commands but leads by example. He’s a good communicator, and always ready to provide assistance or help. I’ll highly recommend working with him.

name: Jonathon Doe
text: Working with Bieber is very good experience for me. He’s a good person. If I need developer in future, I’ll definately hire him.
